plot: Man comes back to small home town after years of being away in California living a double life as a porn star. once back at home he decides to use the money he made to open a comic book store, all while trying to keep his family and townsfolk under the radar to exactly what he was doing while away on "hiatus".
title: Hiatus
plot_es: Man comes back to small home town after years of being away in California living a double life as a porn star. once back at home he decides to use the money he made to open a comic book store, all while trying to keep his family and townsfolk under the radar to exactly what he was doing while away on "hiatus".
plot_en: Man comes back to small home town after years of being away in California living a double life as a porn star. once back at home he decides to use the money he made to open a comic book store, all while trying to keep his family and townsfolk under the radar to exactly what he was doing while away on "hiatus".
